statements: SELECT * FROM signature_mismatches
SELECT id, user_id, signature FROM signature_mismatches WHERE mismatch_count > 5
SELECT id, user_id, signature, mismatch_count FROM signature_mismatches WHERE flagged = TRUE
SELECT * FROM signature_mismatches ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_mismatches WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT id, user_id, signature, mismatch_count, flagged FROM signature_mismatches WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM signature_mismatches WHERE flagged = true ORDER BY mismatch_count DESC;
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_mismatches WHERE mismatch_count >= 5 AND flagged = false;
SELECT * FROM signature_mismatches WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) AND user_id <> 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_mismatches FROM signature_mismatches GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_mismatches DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_mismatches WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, frequency FROM signature_mismatches WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_mismatches FROM signature_mismatches GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 3;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_description FROM flagged_activities WHERE flagged = true ORDER BY id;
SELECT MAX(frequency) AS max_frequency, MIN(frequency) AS min_frequency FROM signature_mismatches;
SELECT id, user_id, frequency, timestamp FROM signature_mismatches WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, activity_description, flagged FROM flagged_activities WHERE flagged = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, frequency, timestamp FROM signature_mismatches WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, activity_description, timestamp FROM flagged_activities WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_activities FROM flagged_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_mismatches WHERE mismatch_count > 5;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM flagged_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, signature FROM signature_mismatches ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_mismatches FROM signature_mismatches GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, flag_reason FROM fraudulent_users WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT id, user_id, signature, mismatch_count FROM signature_mismatches ORDER BY user_id ASC, mismatch_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, signature FROM signature_mismatches WHERE user_id = 10 OR user_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM flagged_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious' AND reason LIKE '%abusive%';
SELECT user_id, flag_reason FROM fraudulent_users WHERE flag_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type, reason FROM flagged_activities JOIN fraudulent_users ON flagged_activities.user_id = fraudulent_users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE id = 100;
SELECT id, activity_type, amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT activity_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_activities WHERE flag_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT date, activity_type, amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, mismatch_count FROM signature_mismatches WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT user_id, signature_blob FROM signatures WHERE mismatch_count > 0;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM users ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM activities WHERE activity_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT signature_id, user_id, timestamp FROM signatures WHERE mismatch_count > 5 LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM flagging WHERE flag_type = 'Abusive' AND flagged_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT fraud_type, fraud_level, user_id FROM fraud WHERE fraud_level >= 5 AND fraud_details LIKE '%scam%' ORDER BY fraud_level DESC;
